snippet: A skin fungus in frogs is threatening a species with extinction, but Chinese-American leaders oppose a proposed import ban that could affect their traditional diets.
lead_paragraph: A skin fungus in frogs is threatening a species with extinction, but Chinese-American leaders oppose a proposed import ban that could affect their traditional diets.

headline.seo: Chytrid Fungus in Frogs Threatens Amphibian Extinction
headline.main: Despite Deadly Fungus, Frog Imports Continue
headline.print_headline: Despite Deadly Fungus, Frog Imports Continue
